articles.title: Wyoming population back up after decline starting in 2015
articles.description: CASPER, Wyo. (AP) — Wyoming's population increased slightly in the second half of 2018 and first half of 2019 after three years of decline.
articles.content:
CASPER, Wyo. (AP) Wyoming's population increased slightly in the second half of 2018 and first half of 2019 after three years of decline.
Census figures released Monday show Wyoming's population grew by 1,158 between July 2018 and July 2019.
